Action: # Publication fees information ToC: APC Information on ToC
publication_fees_information_toc/apc_information_on_toc
## Check ToC of journal with no APC information
Go to the API page at /api/v2/docs
Scroll down this page to the section headed "Search" and the subsection titled: "GET /api/v1/search/journals/{search_query}" at /api/v2/docs#!/Search/get_api_v2_search_journals_search_query
In the text box "search_query" enter the following query: _missing_:(bibjson.apc_url AND bibjson.submission_charges_url)
Scroll to the bottom of that subsection and click the button "Try it out!"
A new section will appear beneath the "Try it out!" button, scroll down to the header "Response Body"

In the "Response Body" there should be lines which is of the form ""id": "xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx" where xxx... is an alphanumeric string. Each of them represents one journal. Take a copy of one of those strings.
Go to the admin journals search interface at /admin/
Enter the ID from 1.6 into the search text box

Expected Test Results: The journal appears as the single result of your search

Action: Click on the title of the journal to be taken to the ToC page

Expected Test Results: Under "PUBLICATION CHARGES" is should say 'No charges?'

Action: Shortcut for 1.1 - 1.9, go to /toc/2344-5416
## Check ToC of journal with APC information (url only)
Go to the API page at /api/v2/docs
Scroll down this page to the section headed "Search" and the subsection titled: "GET /api/v1/search/journals/{search_query}" at /api/v2/docs#!/Search/get_api_v2_search_journals_search_query
In the text box "search_query" enter the following query: _missing_:bibjson.apc AND _exists_:bibjson.apc_url
Scroll to the bottom of that subsection and click the button "Try it out!"
A new section will appear beneath the "Try it out!" button, scroll down to the header "Response Body"

In the "Response Body" there should be lines which is of the form ""id": "xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx" where xxx... is an alphanumeric string. Each of them represents one journal. Take a copy of one of that string.
Go to the admin journals search interface
Enter the ID from 1.6 into the search text box

Expected Test Results: The journal appears as the single result of your search

Action: Click on the title of the journal to be taken to the ToC page

Expected Test Results: In "PUBLICATION CHARGES" there should be information displayed: "Article Processing Charges (APCs): No" that includes link to the APC information

Action: Shortcut for 1.1-1.9, go to /toc/1835-6842
